cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west then turning west-northwest tonight, expected to pass the northern Leeward Islands, track along or north of Hispaniola and Cuba toward the Bahamas and the Florida peninsula during the weekend.

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Guadeloupe west-northwestward to the southeastern Bahamas; Tropical Storm Watch south coast of Dominican Republic and Haiti
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning for northern Leeward Islands, U.S. & British Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico; Tropical Storm Warning Guadeloupe, Dominica
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands, Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola north coast, Turks & Caicos, Bahamas, potentially south Florida
weather_observation.wind: Low (6% chance of tropical-storm-force winds within 5 days)
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall signal for the port within 5-day window
